String.string: By clear trails, I mean slay argons.
A pleasure to watch you work!
Go to {@Rgn:50002$$Shroud Outpost} in {@Rgn:50001$$Granarkus} and find {@LinkCreature:250#3001#Derik}.
Hunt {@LinkCreature:50#5#athakela prowlers} around {@Rgn:50002$$Shroud Outpost} and collect their hides.
Hunt {@LinkCreature:50#10#zomgul gatherers} in Granarkus and take their hides.
Hunt {@LinkCreature:50#4#kalash devastators} north of {@Rgn:50002$$Shroud Outpost} and skin them.
